member.name: T:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ABE_Helpers
member.summary: Helpers for the ABElectronics library.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ABE_Helpers.UpdateByte(System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Updates the value of a single bit within a byte and returns the updated byte
member.param: Position of the bit to change

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ABE_Helpers.UpdateInt(System.Int32,System.Byte,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Updates the value of a single bit within an int and returns the updated int
member.param: Position of the bit to change

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ABE_Helpers.CheckBit(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: Checks the value of a single bit within a byte.
member.param: The bit position within the byte
member.returns: boolean value of the asked bit

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ABE_Helpers.CheckIntBit(System.Int32,System.Byte)
member.summary: Checks the value of a single bit within an int.
member.param: The bit position within the byte
member.returns: boolean value of the asked bit

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ABE_Helpers.WriteI2CByte(Windows.Devices.I2c.I2cDevice,System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: Writes a single byte to an I2C device.
member.param: Value to write to the register

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ABE_Helpers.WriteI2CSingleByte(Windows.Devices.I2c.I2cDevice,System.Byte)
member.summary: Writes a single byte to an I2C device.
member.param: Value to write to the register

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ABE_Helpers.ReadI2CByte(Windows.Devices.I2c.I2cDevice,System.Byte)
member.summary: Read a single byte from an I2C device.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ABE_Helpers.ReadI2CBlockData(Windows.Devices.I2c.I2cDevice,System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: Read a single byte from an I2C device.

member.name: T:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ADCDACPi
member.summary: Class for accessing the ADCDAC Pi from AB Electronics UK.

member.name: P:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ADCDACPi.IsConnected
member.summary: Event triggers when a connection is established.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ADCDACPi.Connect
member.summary: Open a connection to the ADCDAC Pi.

member.name: E:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ADCDACPi.Connected
member.summary: Event occurs when connection is made.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ADCDACPi.ReadADCVoltage(System.Byte)
member.summary: Read the voltage from the selected on the ADC.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ADCDACPi.ReadADCRaw(System.Byte)
member.summary: Read the raw value from the selected on the ADC.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ADCDACPi.SetADCrefVoltage(System.Double)
member.summary: Set the reference for the analogue to digital converter. The ADC uses the raspberry pi 3.3V power as a reference so using this method to set the reference to match the exact output from the 3.3V regulator will increase the accuracy of the ADC readings.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ADCDACPi.SetDACVoltage(System.Byte,System.Double)
member.summary: Set the for the selected channel on the DAC.
member.param: Voltage can be between 0 and 2.047 volts

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ADCDACPi.SetDACRaw(System.Byte,System.Int16)
member.summary: Set the raw from the selected on the DAC.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ADCDACPi.Dispose
member.summary: Close the devices.

member.name: T:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ADCPi
member.summary: Class for controlling the ADC Pi and ADC Pi Plus expansion boards from AB Electronics UK

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ADCPi.#ctor(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: Create an instance of a ADC Pi bus.

member.name: P:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ADCPi.Address1
member.summary: I2C address for the U1 (channels 1 - 4).

member.name: P:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ADCPi.Address2
member.summary: I2C address for the U2 (channels 5 - 8).

member.name: P:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ADCPi.IsConnected
member.summary: Shows if there is a connection with the ADC Pi.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ADCPi.Connect
member.summary: Open a connection with the ADC Pi.

member.name: E:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ADCPi.Connected
member.summary: Event occurs when connection is made.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ADCPi.SetChannel(System.Byte)
member.summary: Private method for updating the configuration to the selected .

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ADCPi.ReadVoltage(System.Byte)
member.summary: Returns the voltage from the selected ADC .

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ADCPi.ReadRaw(System.Byte)
member.summary: Reads the raw value from the selected ADC .
member.returns: raw integer value from ADC buffer

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ADCPi.SetPGA(System.Byte)
member.summary: Set the PGA (Programmable Gain Amplifier) .

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ADCPi.SetBitRate(System.Byte)
member.summary: Set the sample resolution (rate).
member.param: 12 = 12 bit(240SPS max), 14 = 14 bit(60SPS max), 16 = 16 bit(15SPS max), 18 = 18 bit(3.75SPS max)

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ADCPi.SetConversionMode(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Set the conversion mode for ADC.
member.param: 0 = One shot conversion mode, 1 = Continuous conversion mode

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ADCPi.Dispose
member.summary: Dispose of the instance.

member.name: T:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi
member.summary: Class for controlling the IO Pi and IO Pi Plus expansion boards from AB Electronics UK Based on the MCP23017 IO expander IC from Microchip.

member.name: F:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.IODIRA
member.summary: IO direction A - 1= input 0 = output

member.name: F:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.IODIRB
member.summary: IO direction B - 1= input 0 = output

member.name: F:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.IPOLA
member.summary: Input polarity A - If a bit is set, the corresponding GPIO register bit will reflect the inverted value on the pin.

member.name: F:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.IPOLB
member.summary: Input polarity B - If a bit is set, the corresponding GPIO register bit will reflect the inverted value on the pin.

member.name: F:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.GPINTENA
member.summary: The GPINTEN register controls the interrupt-on-change feature for each pin on port A.

member.name: F:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.GPINTENB
member.summary: The GPINTEN register controls the interrupt-on-change feature for each pin on port B.

member.name: F:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.DEFVALA
member.summary: Default value for port A - These bits set the compare value for pins configured for interrupt-on-change. If the associated pin level is the opposite from the register bit, an interrupt occurs.

member.name: F:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.DEFVALB
member.summary: Default value for port B - These bits set the compare value for pins configured for interrupt-on-change. If the associated pin level is the opposite from the register bit, an interrupt occurs.

member.name: F:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.INTCONA
member.summary: Interrupt control register for port A. If 1 interrupt is fired when the pin matches the default value, if 0 the interrupt is fired on state change.

member.name: F:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.INTCONB
member.summary: Interrupt control register for port B. If 1 interrupt is fired when the pin matches the default value, if 0 the interrupt is fired on state change.

member.name: F:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.IOCON
member.summary: See datasheet for configuration register

member.name: F:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.GPPUA
member.summary: pull-up resistors for port A

member.name: F:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.GPPUB
member.summary: pull-up resistors for port B

member.name: F:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.INTFA
member.summary: The INTFA register reflects the interrupt condition on the port A pins of any pin that is enabled for interrupts. A set bit indicates that the associated pin caused the interrupt.

member.name: F:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.INTFB
member.summary: The INTFB register reflects the interrupt condition on the port B pins of any pin that is enabled for interrupts. A set bit indicates that the associated pin caused the interrupt.

member.name: F:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.INTCAPA
member.summary: The INTCAP register captures the GPIO port A value at the time the interrupt occurred.

member.name: F:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.INTCAPB
member.summary: The INTCAP register captures the GPIO port B value at the time the interrupt occurred.

member.name: F:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.GPIOA
member.summary: Data port A.

member.name: F:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.GPIOB
member.summary: Data port B.

member.name: F:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.OLATA
member.summary: Output latches A.

member.name: F:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.OLATB
member.summary: Output latches B

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.#ctor(System.Byte)
member.summary: Create an instance of an IOPi bus.
member.param: I2C Address of IO Pi bus

member.name: P:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.Address
member.summary: I2C address for the IO Pi bus

member.name: P:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.IsConnected
member.summary: Shows if there is a connection with the IO Pi

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.Connect
member.summary: Open a connection with the IO Pi.

member.name: E:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.Connected
member.summary: Event occurs when connection is made.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.SetPinDirection(System.Byte,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Set IO for an individual pin.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.SetPortDirection(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: Set the for an IO . You can control the direction of all 8 pins on a port by sending a single byte value. Each bit in the byte represents one pin so for example 0x0A would set pins 2 and 4 to inputs and all other pins to outputs.
member.param: Direction for all pins on the port. 1 = input, 0 = output

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.SetPinPullup(System.Byte,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Set the internal 100K pull-up resistors for an individual pin.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.SetPortPullups(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: set the internal 100K pull-up resistors for the selected IO port.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.WritePin(System.Byte,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Write to an individual .

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.WritePort(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: Write to all pins on the selected .

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.ReadPin(System.Byte)
member.summary: read the value of an individual .
member.returns: 0 = logic level low, 1 = logic level high

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.ReadPort(System.Byte)
member.summary: Read all pins on the selected .
member.returns: returns number between 0 and 255 or 0x00 and 0xFF

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.InvertPort(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: Invert the polarity of the pins on a selected .
member.param: 0x00 - 0xFF (0 = same logic state of the input pin, 1 = inverted logic state of the input pin)

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.InvertPin(System.Byte,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Invert the of the selected .
member.param: False = same logic state of the input pin, True = inverted logic state of the input pin

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.MirrorInterrupts(System.Byte)
member.summary: Sets the mirror status of the interrupt pins.
member.param: 0 = The INT pins are not mirrored. INTA is associated with PortA and INTB is associated with PortB. 1 = The INT pins are internally connected

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.SetInterruptPolarity(System.Byte)
member.summary: This sets the polarity of the INT output pins.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.SetInterruptType(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: Sets the type of interrupt for each pin on the selected . 1 = interrupt is fired when the pin matches the default value. 0 = the interrupt is fired on state change.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.SetInterruptDefaults(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: These bits set the compare value for pins configured for interrupt-on-change on the selected . If the associated pin level is the opposite from the register bit, an interrupt occurs.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.SetInterruptOnPort(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: Enable interrupts for the pins on the selected .

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.SetInterruptOnPin(System.Byte,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enable interrupts for the selected .

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.ReadInterruptStatus(System.Byte)
member.summary: Read the interrupt status for the pins on the selected .

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.ReadInterruptCapture(System.Byte)
member.summary: Read the value from the selected at the time of the last interrupt trigger.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.ResetInterrupts
member.summary: Reset the interrupts A and B to 0.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.IOPi.Dispose
member.summary: Dispose of the I2C device.

member.name: T:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.RTCPi
member.summary: Class for controlling the RTC Pi and RTC Pi Plus expansion boards from AB Electronics UK Based on the DS1307 real-time clock from Maxim.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.RTCPi.#ctor
member.summary: Create an instance of a RTC Pi bus.

member.name: P:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.RTCPi.IsConnected
member.summary: Shows if there is a connection with the RTC Pi.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.RTCPi.Connect
member.summary: Open a connection with the RTC Pi.

member.name: E:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.RTCPi.Connected
member.summary: Event occurs when connection is made.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.RTCPi.BCDtoInt(System.Byte)
member.summary: Converts BCD format to integer.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.RTCPi.BytetoBCD(System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts byte to BCD format.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.RTCPi.SetDate(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Set the date and time on the RTC.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.RTCPi.ReadDate
member.summary: Read the date and time from the RTC.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.RTCPi.EnableOutput
member.summary: Enable the clock output pin.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.RTCPi.DisableOutput
member.summary: Disable the clock output pin.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.RTCPi.SetFrequency(System.Byte)
member.summary: Set the frequency of the output pin square-wave.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.RTCPi.Dispose
member.summary: Dispose if the RTC Pi device.

member.name: T:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ServoPi
member.summary: Class for controlling the Servo Pi expansion board from AB Electronics UK Based on the PCA9685 PWM controller IC from NXT.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ServoPi.#ctor(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: Create an instance of a Servo Pi bus.
member.param: I2C address of Servo Pi bus
GPIO pin for Output Enable function (0-disabled)

member.name: P:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ServoPi.Address
member.summary: I2C address for the Servo Pi bus.

member.name: P:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ServoPi.OutputEnablePin
member.summary: Set the GPIO pin for the output enable function. The default GPIO pin 4 is not supported in Windows 10 IOT so the OE pad will need to be connected to a different GPIO pin.

member.name: P:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ServoPi.IsConnected
member.summary: Shows if there is a connection with the Servo Pi

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ServoPi.Connect
member.summary: Open a connection with the Servo Pi

member.name: E:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ServoPi.Connected
member.summary: Event occurs when connection is made.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ServoPi.SetPWMFreqency(System.Int32)
member.summary: Set the output frequency of all PWM channels. The output frequency is programmable from a typical 40Hz to 1000Hz.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ServoPi.SetPWM(System.Byte,System.Int16,System.Int16)
member.summary: Set the PWM output on a single .

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ServoPi.SetAllPWM(System.Int16,System.Int16)
member.summary: Set PWM output on all channels.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ServoPi.OutputDisable
member.summary: Disable output via OE pin. Only used when the OE jumper is joined.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ServoPi.OutputEnable
member.summary: Enable output via OE pin. Only used when the OE jumper is joined.

member.name: M:ABElectronics_Win10IOT_Libraries.ServoPi.Dispose
member.summary: Dispose of the Servo Pi device.
